name: Capsule War
description:
USE FULL SCREEN!!

CAPSULE WAR BY KARJALANPIIRAKKA GAMES

Free minigame by Karjalanpiirakka Games. Kill enemys and get good scores.

If game is not working please test downloadable version. 

MUSIC:

All That by Bensound | https://www.bensound.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com

HELP FOR NOOBS

A, S, D, W: Movement

Left mouse: Aim

Right mouse: Shoot

Space: Jump

Scroll wheel: Change weapon

Move mouse to rotate

ATTENTION: There is trampolines in center

See your health bar in top left.

Please send a review if you liked or found a bug.
